titleStmt.title: The Royal remembrancer, or, A Healing letter with arguments and reasons, to the Presbyterians and nonconformists : seasonably offered, from divers learned and conforming persons, to the view of Mr. Calamy, Mr. Jenkins, and others.
titleStmt.author: Calamy, Edmund, 1600-1666.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
